mapper.select:
/* selectEtcHrDailyServiceMain */
SELECT ETC_HRSERVICE_ID AS etcHrServiceId ,ETC_HRMAIN_ID AS etcHRMainId ,ETC_HRMAIL_CHK AS etcHrMailServiceChk ,ETC_HRMAIL_BIGO AS etcHrMailServiceBigo ,ETC_HRAPPROVE_CHK AS etcHrApproveServiceChk ,ETC_HRAPPROVE_BIGO AS etcHrApproveServiceBigo ,ETC_HRBACKUP_CHK AS etcHrBackUpServiceChk ,ETC_HRBACKUP_BIGO AS etcHrBackUpServiceBigo FROM ETC_DAILY_HRSERVICE WHERE ETC_HRMAIN_ID = #{etcHRMainId}

/* selectEtcHrDailyServiceMain */
SELECT ETC_HRSERVER_ID AS etcHrServerId ,ETC_HRMAIN_ID AS etcHrMainId ,CHAEHRDB_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS chaEhrDbCpuUsageChk ,CHAEHRDB_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS chaEhrDbCpuUsageBigo ,CHAEHRDB_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS chaEhrDbMemUsageChk ,CHAEHRDB_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS chaEhrDbMemUsageBigo ,CHAEHRDB_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS chaEhrDbDiskUsageChk ,CHAEHRDB_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS chaEhrDbDiskUsageBigo ,CHAEHRDB_EVENT_CHK AS chaEhrDbEventChk ,CHAEHRDB_EVENT_BIGO AS chaEhrDbEventBigo ,CHAEHRDB_V3_CHK AS chaEhrDbV3Chk ,CHAEHRDB_V3_BIGO AS chaEhrDbV3Bigo ,CHAEHRWEB_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS chaEhrWebCpuUsageChk ,CHAEHRWEB_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS chaEhrWebCpuUsageBigo ,CHAEHRWEB_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS chaEhrWebMemUsageChk ,CHAEHRWEB_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS chaEhrWebMemUsageBigo ,CHAEHRWEB_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS chaEhrWebDiskUsageChk ,CHAEHRWEB_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS chaEhrWebDiskUsageBigo ,CHAEHRWEB_EVENT_CHK AS chaEhrWebEventChk ,CHAEHRWEB_EVENT_BIGO AS chaEhrWebEventBigo ,CHAEHRWEB_V3_CHK AS chaEhrWebV3Chk ,CHAEHRWEB_V3_BIGO AS chaEhrWebV3Bigo ,CHAEHRDEV_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS chaEhrDevCpuUsageChk ,CHAEHRDEV_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS chaEhrDevCpuUsageBigo ,CHAEHRDEV_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS chaEhrDevMemUsageChk ,CHAEHRDEV_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS chaEhrDevMemUsageBigo ,CHAEHRDEV_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS chaEhrDevDiskUsageChk ,CHAEHRDEV_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS chaEhrDevDiskUsageBigo ,CHAEHRDEV_EVENT_CHK AS chaEhrDevEventChk ,CHAEHRDEV_EVENT_BIGO AS chaEhrDevEventBigo ,CHAEHRDEV_V3_CHK AS chaEhrDevV3Chk ,CHAEHRDEV_V3_BIGO AS chaEhrDevV3Bigo ,DDCEHRWEB_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS ddcEhrWebCpuUsageChk ,DDCEHRWEB_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS ddcEhrWebCpuUsageBigo ,DDCEHRWEB_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS ddcEhrWebMemUsageChk ,DDCEHRWEB_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS ddcEhrWebMemUsageBigo ,DDCEHRWEB_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS ddcEhrWebDiskUsageChk ,DDCEHRWEB_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS ddcEhrWebDiskUsageBigo ,DDCEHRWEB_EVENT_CHK AS ddcEhrWebEventChk ,DDCEHRWEB_EVENT_BIGO AS ddcEhrWebEventBigo ,DDCEHRWEB_V3_CHK AS ddcEhrWebV3Chk ,DDCEHRWEB_V3_BIGO AS ddcEhrWebV3Bigo FROM ETC_DAILY_HRSERVER WHERE ETC_HRMAIN_ID = #{etcHRMainId}
